text: Carl Alexander Speare (1952-2009), was a male boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== Speare represented England and won a bronze medal in the middleweight (-73 Kg) division, at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, New Zealand. He turned professional on 22 April 1974 and fought in 17 fights until 1978. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2009 deaths Category:English male boxers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Boxers at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games Category:Middleweight boxers
title: Carl Speare
